name: Grome
description:
In this intense zombie survival game, you find yourself stranded in a dense forest with nothing but a simple dagger to defend yourself against the relentless hordes of the undead. With no shelter or supplies, you must fight to stay alive, using your stealth and cunning to outsmart the zombies and evade their grasp.

Ready to embark on an adventure? Here are the keys to navigate the game world:

  1. Move like a pro with W, A, S, D or Up, Down, Left, Right arrow keys.
  2. Defeat enemies and conquer the game with the power of F!

Kudos to Purvesh Choudhary, the SOLO DEVELOPER who brought this game to life. And let's not forget the stunning Main Menu background image from Midjourney and the awesome royalty-free sounds that were used to make this game even more epic!

Hey, hey! Are you ready to level up your gaming experience? If you happen to come across any pesky bugs or have some sweet tips to share, you're in luck! The developers have opened up the comments section just for you. So, don't be shy and drop a line. Your feedback and support are much appreciated, and who knows, your input might just make the game even more epic! Let's join hands and make this game even better!
